front.title: IEEE Guide for Cable Connections for Gas-Insulated Substations

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This guide establishes typical dimensions for connections of a gas-insulated substation (GIS) to extruded, self contained fluid-filled, and high pressure fluid-filled (pipe-type) cables in single and three phase arrangements for voltages 72.5 kV to 550 kV.
